original_definition: 'balancing period' means the period within which the off-take of an amount of natural gas, expressed in units of energy, must be offset by every network user by means of the injection of the same amount of natural gas into the transmission network in accordance with the transport contract or the network code;
generated_definition: NO JSON AS AN OUTPUT OBTAINED
